      Parameters:

    • getAllProducts

      @GetMapping("/service") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ProductInfoDTO> getAllProducts(@RequestParam(required=false) Optional<UUID[]> ids, @RequestParam(required=false) Optional<String[]> upcs, @RequestParam(required=false) Optional<String> name, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get products by ids or upcs or name Note: If ids is present, then upcs and name are ignored etc.
      Parameters:
      ids - product ids
      upcs - product Universal Product Codes
      name - product name (will find all products with name containing this string)
      pageable - page info
      Returns:
      page of products

    • getAllProductsByFilers

      @GetMapping @ResponseStatus(OK) public ProductsResponse getAllProductsByFilers(@RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> sports, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> colors, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> features, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> countries, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> brands, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<Double> sizeUS, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<Double> sizeEUR, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<Double> sizeUK, @RequestParam(required=false) BigDecimal minPrice, @RequestParam(required=false) BigDecimal maxPrice, @RequestParam(required=false) String query, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get products by filters and search query. All parameters are optional.

      Note: if filters are present, query will find products that match all specified filters. Search query will run over name only.

      Parameters:
      sports - sports, can be multiple
      colors - colors, can be multiple
      features - features, can be multiple
      countries - countries, can be multiple
      brands - brands, can be multiple
      sizeUS - sizeUS, can be multiple
      sizeEUR - sizeEUR, can be multiple
      sizeUK - sizeUK, can be multiple
      minPrice - min price (should be less or equal than maxPrice)
      maxPrice - max price (should be greater or equal than minPrice)
      query - search query
      pageable - page info
      Returns:
      page of products

    • getAllRecentProducts

      @GetMapping("/recent") @ResponseStatus(OK) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ProductInfoDTO> getAllRecentProducts(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get products that were added recently.
      Parameters:
      pageable - page info
      Returns:
      page of products

    • getPriceRange

      @GetMapping("/price-range") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PriceRangeDTO> getPriceRange(@RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> sports, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> colors, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> features, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> countries, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<String> brands, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<Double> sizeUS, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<Double> sizeEUR, @RequestParam(required=false) Collection<Double> sizeUK, @RequestParam(required=false) String query)
      Get price range for products that match filters and search query.
      Parameters:
      sports - sports, can be multiple
      colors - colors, can be multiple
      features - features, can be multiple
      countries - countries, can be multiple
      brands - brands, can be multiple
      sizeUS - sizeUS, can be multiple
      sizeEUR - sizeEUR, can be multiple
      sizeUK - sizeUK, can be multiple
      query - search query
      Returns:
      price range (min and max), if no products found - min and max will be null
